text:
(1)

Sheepshead Bay (Brooklyn): A view west from Shore Boulevard. The buildings across the bay are on Emmons Avenue and were razed later when the avenue was widened.

July 8, 1933

P. L. Sperr

(2)

North across the bay toward Emmons Avenue, at Sheepshead Bay Road, showing the Bayview Apartment and the Lundy Brothers Restaurant.

August 1, 1935

P. L. Sperr

(3)

The Bay at Emmons Avenue and East 16th Street. The avenue is being widened.

July 9, 1936

P. L. Sperr
title: Sheepshead Bay - Brooklyn - [Lundy Brothers Restaurant - Bayview Apartments.]
